text: Maga musavara tyancya janasamuhacya lokampaiki kevala thodyaca lokanni imana rakhale, tehi phira'auna ani apalya saradaransi bhaya rakhata ki kadacita tyanna duhkha na pohacave ani kharokhara phira'auna tya desata ucca (saktisali) hota ani hi gostadekhila hoti ki to maryadecya bahera gela hota
